Package org.drip.function.rdtor1solver

Class ConvergenceControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.function.rdtor1solver.ConvergenceControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteriorPointBarrierControl
    public class ConvergenceControl
extends java.lang.Object
    ConvergenceControl contains the Rd To R1 Convergence Control/Tuning Parameters.

    • Module = Function
    • Package = Rd To R1 Solver
    • Specification = Numerical Optimizer Library
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
